A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This being the 8th Star Wars movie it had a tightrope to walk\, all kinds of crazy twists and turns have already been done by previous movies in the franchise so it couldn't repeat them. Still\, I have been reading great reviews from both fans and critics\, so I went in with a high expectation and it still was able to surprise and satisfy me. The story has enough twist n turns as well as fan service to make you laugh out loud in awe. Filled with meaningful character development\, nice action sequences\, sparkles of humor and a story well written\, the movie is able to balance the Star wars legacy while moving forward with a new chapter. This was Mark Hamill movies\, he gives the best performance of his career.
